Name Synopsis

Synopsis One-line summary of the concept that is usable as a tool tip.
Syntax Synopsis: MarkedText (mandatory)
Description The full summary of a concept consists of the Synopsis and the optional elements Syntax, Types and Function.

Synopsis is mandatory (this is not yet enforced).
